main event: John H. Spizziri reported seeing an unidentified flying object over Lancaster, Pennsylvania, on June 8, 1952.
interesting points: The object was initially observed as a stationary yellow light before it suddenly accelerated and maneuvered, disappearing from view,Another orange-colored object was also observed moving erratically during the sighting,Mr. Spizziri's son and other members of the Ground Observer Corps were witnesses,The weather conditions were clear with four-mile visibility and calm winds,The observation lasted for about 30 minutes.
sighted object: a yellow light and an orange-colored object in the sky
witness description: John H. Spizziri, a Civilian observer, and his son
